ComicInfo.Series: Sir Edward Grey, Witchfinder: The Mysteries of Unland
ComicInfo.Summary:
The shocking truth of Unland!
Sir Edward Grey digs deeper into the shocking truth about Unland even as the city drowns in the rising waters. With the help of a mysterious woman, Grey faces raging waters and the eel assassins that have haunted his every step!
Written by horror fiction legend Kim Newman (Anno Dracula)!
From the pages of Hellboy!
#GoToUnland
General Notes: The issue's epilogue was directly continued a year later in Abe Sapien #25.
